data.text: Mene ɔbarima a mahu amane
Wapam me afi ne ho ama manantew
Ampa ara wama nsa so atia me
Wama me were ne me nam anyin
Waka me ahyɛ mu, na watua me ano
Wama matena sum mu
Wato ɔfasu atwa me ho ahyia enti mintumi nguan;
Mpo sɛ mefrɛ anaasɛ mebɔ mpae srɛ mmoa a
Ɔde abotan asiw me kwan;
Te sɛ sisi a ɔda hɔ retwɛn,
ɔtwee me fii ɔkwan no mu bebaree me
Okuntun ne ta mu
Ɔde bɛmma a efi ne kotoku mu
Meyɛɛ akyiwade maa me nkurɔfo nyinaa;
Ɔde nhaban nweenwen ahyɛ me ma.
Ɔde mmosea abubu me se;
Wɔama asomdwoe abɔ me;
Enti mise, “Mʼanuonyam asa,
Mekae mʼamanehunu wɔ mʼakyinkyinakyinkyin mu,
Mekae yiye,
Nanso midwen eyi ho;
Awurade dɔ kɛse nti yɛnsɛee ɛ.
Ɛyɛ foforo anɔpa biara;
Meka kyerɛ me ho se,
Awurade ye ma wɔn a wɔn anidaso wɔ ne mu,
Eye sɛ wɔyɛ komm
Eye ma ɔbarima sɛ ɔsoa konnua no
Ma ɔntena ase komm,
Ma ɔmfa nʼanim nsie wɔ mfutuma mu,
Ma ɔmfa nʼafono mma nea ɔpɛɛ sɛ ɔbɔ no no
Na Awurade ntow onipa biara nkyene koraa.
Ɛwɔ mu, ɔde awerɛhow ba de, nanso obenya ayamhyehye.
Ofi amemenemfe mu de amanehunu
Sɛ wɔde wɔn nan dwerɛw
sɛ wotiatia obi ahofadi so
anaa sɛ wobu obi ntɛnkyew a,
Hena na obetumi aka na wama aba mu
Ɛnyɛ Ɔsorosoroni no anom
Adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ ɔteasefo nwiinwii
Momma yɛnhwehwɛ yɛn akwan mu na yɛnsɔ nhwɛ,
Momma yɛmma yɛn koma ne yɛn nsa so,
“Yɛayɛ bɔne, na yɛatew atua
“Wode abufuw akata wo ho ataa yɛn;
Wode wo ho asie omununkum mu
Woayɛ yɛn atantanne ne nwura
“Yɛn atamfo nyinaa abaa wɔn anom tɛtrɛɛ
Yɛabrɛ ne ahunahuna ne akukuruhwease,
Me nusu sen sɛ asuten
Me nusu bɛsen ara,
kosi sɛ Awurade bɛhwɛ
Nea mihu no ma me kra werɛ how,
Mʼatamfo a menyɛɛ wɔn hwee
Wɔpɛɛ sɛ wotwa me nkwa so
nsu bu faa me ti so,
Mebɔɔ wo din, Awurade
Wotee me sufrɛ: “Nsiw wʼaso
Wutwiw bɛn me bere a mefrɛɛ wo no,
Wo Awurade, wudii mʼasɛm maa me;
Woahu bɔne a wɔayɛ me, Awurade.
Woahu wɔn aweretɔ no mu den,
Awurade, woate wɔn ntwirii,
nea mʼatamfo ka no asomsɛm na wɔka no brɛoo
Hwɛ wɔn! Sɛ wogyinagyina hɔ anaasɛ wɔtete hɔ,
Fa nea ɛfata tua wɔn so ka, Awurade,
Pirim wɔn koma,
Fa abufuw taa wɔn, na sɛe wɔn
